CodeList.Name: Patient Global Impression Generic Modification Version Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Patient Global Impression Generic Modification Version test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Patient Global Impression - Considering all the ways your condition impacts you, how severe is your condition at this time?
Patient Global Impression - Compared to <previously assessed protocol specified time point> how much has your condition changed?
Patient Global Impression - Compared to <previously assessed protocol specified time point> how much has your condition improved?
Patient Global Impression - How was your overall health?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: PGI Generic Modification Version - Overall Health

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Patient Global Impression Generic Modification Version Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire PGI Generic Modification Version Test Code Terminology
